channel.title: I'm Bryan, from Minnnneeeesoooootah
channel.description:
Hi there,
Bryan Strawser here, I’m principal & CEO of a small consulting firm in Minnesota called Bryghtpath - we primarily focus on crisis management, business continuity, and crisis communications.
You can learn more about us at http://bryghtpath.com
I look forward to meeting all of you virtually - sharing what I know, and learning from each of you!
Thanks, Bryan
